epics.title: Centralized Offer Management Platform (OMP) Development
epics.description: Design and implement a centralized Offer Management Platform (OMP) to onboard, manage, and approve/reject offers with maker-checker flows. This platform will serve as the single source of truth for all offer data, ensuring consistency and compliance across all digital touchpoints. Business justification: Enables unified, auditable, and efficient offer lifecycle management, reducing operational overhead and discrepancies.

stories.title: Backend Offer Onboarding and Management APIs
stories.description: Develop backend APIs for onboarding, updating, and managing offers, including support for OMP template ingestion and compliance with merchant/category standards.
acceptance_criteria: APIs support CRUD operations for offers
Offer data validated against OMP template
APIs enforce compliance with merchant/category standards
Audit logs maintained for all changes

subtasks.title: Design Offer Data Model
subtasks.description: Design database schema and data model for offers, supporting all required fields from OMP template.

subtasks.title: Implement Offer CRUD APIs
subtasks.description: Develop RESTful APIs for create, read, update, and delete operations on offers.

subtasks.title: Validation and Compliance Layer
subtasks.description: Implement validation logic to ensure offer data matches OMP template and merchant/category standards.

subtasks.title: Audit Logging
subtasks.description: Implement audit logging for all offer management actions.

subtasks.title: API Documentation
subtasks.description: Document all offer management APIs for internal and external use.

subtasks.title: Unit and Integration Testing
subtasks.description: Write and execute tests for all offer management APIs.

stories.title: Offer Management Portal UI
stories.description: Develop a user-friendly web interface for offer onboarding, management, and approval/rejection with maker-checker flows.
acceptance_criteria: UI supports offer creation, editing, and deletion
Responsive design for desktop and tablet

subtasks.title: UI Wireframes and Prototypes
subtasks.description: Design wireframes and interactive prototypes for OMP screens.

subtasks.title: Implement Offer Onboarding Screens
subtasks.description: Develop frontend components for offer creation and editing.

subtasks.title: Maker-Checker Workflow UI
subtasks.description: Implement UI for approval/rejection flows with status tracking.

subtasks.title: Role-Based Access Control
subtasks.description: Integrate RBAC to restrict access based on user roles (maker/checker/admin).

subtasks.title: Frontend-Backend Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate UI with backend offer management APIs.

subtasks.title: UI Testing and Bug Fixes
subtasks.description: Conduct UI testing and resolve identified issues.

stories.title: OMP End-to-End Testing
stories.description: Perform comprehensive QA for OMP, covering functional, integration, and security aspects.
acceptance_criteria: All OMP features tested and verified

subtasks.title: Test Case Design
subtasks.description: Write detailed test cases for all OMP features.

subtasks.title: Functional Testing
subtasks.description: Execute functional tests for OMP workflows.

subtasks.title: Security and Access Control Testing
subtasks.description: Test RBAC and security features for vulnerabilities.

subtasks.title: Regression Testing
subtasks.description: Conduct regression testing after bug fixes.

stories.title: Offer Management Platform Go-Live Planning
stories.description: Coordinate go-live activities, user training, and post-launch support for OMP.

subtasks.title: Go-Live Checklist Preparation
subtasks.description: Prepare and review go-live checklist for OMP.

subtasks.title: User Training Sessions
subtasks.description: Conduct training for OMP users (makers/checkers/admins).

subtasks.title: Post-Launch Support Plan
subtasks.description: Define and communicate support plan for OMP users.

epics.title: Unified Customer Identification and Intelligence Integration
epics.description: Implement a unified customer identification system using hashed mobile numbers and integrate monthly merchant recommendation files from CIU to Crayon Data. Business justification: Ensures accurate, privacy-compliant customer targeting and enables personalized offer delivery across all digital assets.

stories.title: Hashed Mobile Number Customer Identifier
stories.description: Develop and integrate a system to generate, store, and use hashed mobile numbers as unique customer identifiers across all platforms.
acceptance_criteria: Hashed mobile number generated using agreed algorithm
Identifier used in all offer selection and delivery processes

subtasks.title: Hashing Algorithm Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement secure hashing algorithm for mobile numbers.

subtasks.title: Integration with Offer Selection Engine
subtasks.description: Integrate hashed identifier into offer selection and delivery workflows.

subtasks.title: Compliance and Security Review
subtasks.description: Review implementation for compliance with privacy and security standards.

stories.title: CIU to Crayon Data File Ingestion Pipeline
stories.description: Build a secure, scalable pipeline to ingest monthly top 40 merchant recommendation files (parquet format, up to 50GB) from CIU via SFTP.
acceptance_criteria: Files ingested within 24 hours of availability
Checksum validation and error handling implemented

subtasks.title: SFTP Integration and Automation
subtasks.description: Automate secure SFTP file transfer and monitoring.

subtasks.title: Parquet File Parsing and Validation
subtasks.description: Parse and validate parquet files, including checksum verification.

subtasks.title: Data Mapping and Storage
subtasks.description: Map merchant recommendations to hashed customer identifiers and store in database.

subtasks.title: Error Handling and Alerting
subtasks.description: Implement error handling and alerting for failed ingestions.

stories.title: Customer Data QA and Validation
stories.description: Test and validate the customer identification and data ingestion processes for accuracy, completeness, and compliance.
acceptance_criteria: All records mapped to valid hashed identifiers

subtasks.title: Test Data Generation
subtasks.description: Generate test data for all customer identifier and ingestion scenarios.

subtasks.title: Ingestion Pipeline Testing
subtasks.description: Test file ingestion, parsing, and mapping logic.

subtasks.title: Compliance Testing
subtasks.description: Validate privacy and security compliance of data handling.

stories.title: SFTP and Data Pipeline Infrastructure Setup
stories.description: Provision and configure secure, scalable infrastructure for SFTP and data pipelines.
acceptance_criteria: Data pipeline infrastructure meets performance and security requirements

subtasks.title: SFTP Server Provisioning
subtasks.description: Set up and secure SFTP server for file transfers.

subtasks.title: Pipeline Resource Allocation
subtasks.description: Allocate compute and storage resources for ingestion pipeline.

subtasks.title: Monitoring and Alerting Setup
subtasks.description: Implement monitoring and alerting for SFTP and pipeline health.

stories.title: Stakeholder Coordination for Data Sharing
stories.description: Coordinate with HDFC Bank and CIU teams for timely and accurate data sharing.

subtasks.title: Data Sharing Agreement Review
subtasks.description: Review and finalize data sharing agreements with stakeholders.

subtasks.title: Monthly Data Sharing Coordination
subtasks.description: Coordinate monthly data sharing and ingestion timelines.

epics.title: Offer Selection Engine and Personalization
epics.description: Develop a rule-engine based offer selection engine that supports both real-time API-based and batch-based NBO delivery, including dynamic personalization and marketing veto logic. Business justification: Drives customer engagement by ensuring relevant, consistent, and prioritized offers across all digital assets.

stories.title: Rule Engine Implementation
stories.description: Design and implement a configurable rule engine for offer selection, supporting business rules, personalization, and marketing veto.
acceptance_criteria: Rule engine supports all required business rules
Personalization logic based on customer data
Marketing veto logic for prioritized merchants
Rule changes do not require code deployment

subtasks.title: Rule Engine Design
subtasks.description: Design architecture and data model for rule engine.

subtasks.title: Rule Engine Core Implementation
subtasks.description: Develop core logic for rule evaluation and execution.

subtasks.title: Personalization Logic Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate customer data for dynamic personalization.

subtasks.title: Marketing Veto Logic
subtasks.description: Implement logic for prioritized merchant display based on marketing veto.

subtasks.title: Rule Management UI/API
subtasks.description: Develop UI/API for business users to manage rules.

stories.title: Batch and Real-Time NBO Delivery
stories.description: Implement both real-time API-based and batch-based NBO delivery mechanisms to support all digital assets and mitigate system stability risks.
acceptance_criteria: Batch files generated and delivered as per schedule
Batch and API outputs are consistent

subtasks.title: Real-Time API Implementation
subtasks.description: Develop and optimize real-time API for NBO delivery.

subtasks.title: Batch File Generation Logic
subtasks.description: Implement logic to generate batch files for non-API integrated assets.

subtasks.title: Consistency Validation
subtasks.description: Ensure outputs from batch and API are consistent for the same customer.

subtasks.title: Performance Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize API and batch processes for scale and speed.

stories.title: Offer Selection Engine QA
stories.description: Test rule engine, personalization, and NBO delivery for accuracy, performance, and reliability.
acceptance_criteria: All business rules tested and verified
API and batch outputs validated for consistency

subtasks.title: Rule Engine Test Case Design
subtasks.description: Design test cases for all rule and personalization scenarios.

subtasks.title: Performance and Load Testing
subtasks.description: Test API and batch delivery under expected and peak loads.

subtasks.title: Regression and Consistency Testing
subtasks.description: Validate consistency between API and batch outputs.

stories.title: Business Rule Definition and Approval
stories.description: Work with business stakeholders to define, document, and approve all offer selection and personalization rules.
acceptance_criteria: All rules documented and signed off

subtasks.title: Rule Workshop Facilitation
subtasks.description: Facilitate workshops to gather and refine business rules.

subtasks.title: Rule Documentation and Versioning
subtasks.description: Document rules and maintain version history.

stories.title: Offer Engine Infrastructure and Scalability
stories.description: Provision and configure infrastructure to support 10M API calls/month (scalable to 40M), including monitoring and auto-scaling.

subtasks.title: API Gateway and Load Balancer Setup
subtasks.description: Configure API gateway and load balancers for high availability.

subtasks.title: Auto-Scaling Configuration
subtasks.description: Set up auto-scaling policies for offer engine services.

subtasks.title: Monitoring and Alerting
subtasks.description: Implement monitoring and alerting for API and batch delivery.

stories.title: Compliance Review for Offer Selection and Delivery
stories.description: Ensure all offer selection and delivery processes comply with regulatory and privacy requirements.

subtasks.title: Regulatory Review
subtasks.description: Review offer selection and delivery for regulatory compliance.

subtasks.title: Privacy Impact Assessment
subtasks.description: Conduct privacy impact assessment for all customer data flows.

epics.title: Choice API and Smartbuy Portal Integration
epics.description: Integrate the Choice API with the Smartbuy portal for real-time NBO delivery, including SSO, interaction tracking, and seamless user experience. Business justification: Delivers consistent, personalized offers to customers on Smartbuy, increasing engagement and conversion.

stories.title: Smartbuy Portal UI Integration
stories.description: Integrate Choice API with Smartbuy frontend to display NBOs, including SSO and interaction tracking (like/dislike, views, bookmarks).
acceptance_criteria: NBOs displayed on Smartbuy as per API response

subtasks.title: API Integration with Smartbuy UI
subtasks.description: Integrate Choice API endpoints with Smartbuy frontend components.

subtasks.title: SSO Integration
subtasks.description: Implement SSO for seamless user authentication and redirection.

subtasks.title: Interaction Tracking Implementation
subtasks.description: Capture and store user interactions (like/dislike, views, bookmarks).

subtasks.title: UI Testing and Bug Fixes
subtasks.description: Test UI integration and resolve issues.

stories.title: Backend Support for Smartbuy Integration
stories.description: Provide backend support for Smartbuy integration, including APIs for interaction tracking and SSO session management.

subtasks.title: Interaction Tracking API Implementation
subtasks.description: Develop backend APIs to record and retrieve user interactions.

subtasks.title: SSO Session Management
subtasks.description: Implement backend logic for SSO session validation and management.

subtasks.title: Security and Compliance Review
subtasks.description: Review and secure all data flows for compliance.

subtasks.title: API Documentation
subtasks.description: Document all Smartbuy integration APIs.

stories.title: Smartbuy Integration QA
stories.description: Test Smartbuy portal integration for NBO display, SSO, and interaction tracking.
acceptance_criteria: NBOs displayed correctly for all test cases
SSO works across all supported flows

subtasks.title: Integration Test Case Design
subtasks.description: Design test cases for all Smartbuy integration scenarios.

subtasks.title: Functional Testing
subtasks.description: Test NBO display, SSO, and interaction tracking.

subtasks.title: Regression Testing
subtasks.description: Conduct regression testing after bug fixes.

stories.title: Smartbuy Integration Infrastructure
stories.description: Provision and configure infrastructure for Smartbuy integration, including API whitelisting and environment setup.
acceptance_criteria: API whitelisting between Crayon Data and R360 completed
Stage and production environments set up

subtasks.title: API Whitelisting Configuration
subtasks.description: Coordinate and configure API whitelisting between Crayon Data and R360.

subtasks.title: Environment Setup
subtasks.description: Set up and validate stage and production environments for integration.

stories.title: Smartbuy Go-Live and Support
stories.description: Plan and coordinate Smartbuy integration go-live, user training, and support.

subtasks.title: Go-Live Planning
subtasks.description: Prepare go-live checklist and coordinate launch activities.

subtasks.title: Support Plan Definition
subtasks.description: Define and communicate support plan for Smartbuy integration.

epics.title: Batch NBO Delivery for Non-API Integrated Assets
epics.description: Implement batch file generation and delivery for NBOs to non-API integrated assets (e.g., netbanking app, website), including support for store locations via zip codes. Business justification: Ensures all customers receive consistent offers, regardless of digital asset integration maturity.

stories.title: Batch File Generation for NBO Delivery
stories.description: Develop logic to generate and deliver batch files for NBOs, including support for store locations via zip codes.
acceptance_criteria: Batch files generated as per agreed format and schedule
Store locations included based on zip codes

subtasks.title: Batch File Format Design
subtasks.description: Define and document batch file format for NBO delivery.

subtasks.title: Batch Generation Logic Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement logic to generate batch files with NBOs and store locations.

subtasks.title: Checksum and Validation
subtasks.description: Add checksum and validation logic for file integrity.

subtasks.title: Batch Delivery Automation
subtasks.description: Automate delivery of batch files to designated endpoints.

stories.title: Batch NBO Delivery QA
stories.description: Test batch file generation, delivery, and integrity for all supported assets.
acceptance_criteria: Batch files validated for format and content
Checksum validation passes for all files

subtasks.title: Batch File Test Case Design
subtasks.description: Design test cases for batch file generation and delivery.

subtasks.title: Batch File Validation Testing
subtasks.description: Test batch files for format, content, and checksum.

subtasks.title: Regression Testing
subtasks.description: Conduct regression testing after bug fixes.

stories.title: Batch Delivery Infrastructure Setup
stories.description: Provision and configure infrastructure for secure batch file delivery.
acceptance_criteria: Batch delivery infrastructure provisioned and secured

subtasks.title: Batch Delivery Endpoint Setup
subtasks.description: Set up secure endpoints for batch file delivery.

subtasks.title: Monitoring and Alerting
subtasks.description: Implement monitoring and alerting for batch delivery failures.

stories.title: Batch Delivery Coordination
stories.description: Coordinate with HDFC Bank IT for batch delivery schedules and issue resolution.

subtasks.title: Schedule Coordination
subtasks.description: Coordinate batch delivery schedules with HDFC Bank IT.

subtasks.title: Issue Resolution Planning
subtasks.description: Define and communicate process for batch delivery issue resolution.
